references.paper_title: A domain based approach to social relation recognition
references.reason: This paper introduced a domain-based approach to social relation recognition, providing a benchmark dataset and establishing a foundation for subsequent research in the field.

references.paper_title: Dual-glance model for deciphering social relationships
references.reason: This work proposed a dual-glance model that leverages multiple contextual regions to enhance the accuracy of social relationship recognition.
This paper introduced a graph-based method for social relation reasoning, considering the logical constraints among multiple relationships to improve performance.

references.paper_title: Deep reasoning with knowledge graph for social relationship understanding
references.reason: This study integrated a knowledge graph into the social relationship recognition model, leveraging rich prior knowledge to enhance reasoning capabilities.

references.paper_title: BLIP-2: Bootstrapping language-image pre-training with frozen image encoders and large language models
references.reason: This paper presented BLIP-2, a vision-language model that serves as the foundation for the perception phase of SocialGPT, providing high-quality textual descriptions of images.
